DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study collect data standard care use St. Jude Medical ( SJM ) Angio Seal™ Evolution™ V-Twist Integrated Platform ( VIP ) Devices diagnostic and/or interventional radiology patient population .

Patient undergoing diagnostic and/or interventional radiology procedure via femoral arterial access investigator perform procedure would use AngioSeal closure part his/her routine care patient .
